description:
B2B marketing & sales platform

presono is a B2B marketing & sales platform with multiple benefits in different usecases. From company and product presentations to tradefair apps and product catalogs: the platform helps keeping content up-to-date, be on-brand, interact with your customers, engage them and analyse their interests. It increases marketing productivity, improves sales effectiveness and creates an amazing buyers experience which all together supports closing more deals faster.
